title: How to install a PWA?
subtext: Choose the browser and device you are using.

steps.instruction: Scroll down and tap Add to Home screen.
Open app from home screen, as any other native app.
Confirm by tapping Add to Home screen.
Choose by tapping Add automatically or by dragging the image to your home screen.
Open app from home screen, as any other native app.

manuals.recommendation: At this moment you cannot use this app on iOS devices.
manuals.body: Unfortunately video stream in a PWA is still not supported by any browser, in iOS. We recommend you to use Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox or Microsoft Edge on an Android phone.

manuals.recommendation: We recommend you to use Chrome, Firefox or Edge.
manuals.body: Unfortunately we cannot garantee the optimal functionality of this PWA in all browsers. Please use Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox or Microsoft Edge for tested results.
